pages.text: Cultivators who have forged their bodies and have started to gather $(spiritual energy), converts this energy into $(qi) and stores it in their bodies.

Cultivators who use $(qi) are able to use $(l:cultivation_mastery:items_category/spirit_stones_category/low_spirit_stones_entry)low spirit stones$(/l) to gather $(spiritual energy). If they use $(l:cultivation_mastery:items_category/spirit_stones_category)spirit stones$(/l) with a higher level of $(spiritual energy), their body will explode due to having such a condensed and pure form of $(qi) in their body that it can't handle.
